page.title: 15ALRESFORD CHILDREN'S HOME
page.content: The home,{Southdowns}, was established by a Methodist Group in 1869. There are 23 staff at the home and they look after 37 children, who are handicapped or who cannot live with their parents for one reason or another (Perhaps there were a lot of arguments or the parents could not cope). The youngest child is two years old and the oldest is nineteen. The children are not educated at the home but attend the local schools; this is much better for them as they then fit in with 'normal' children. The person in charge is known as the Superintendent.
